repairedDockerfile:
FROM ubuntu 

RUN apt-get update && \  
apt-get dist-upgrade -y && \
 apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y nginx-extras ca-certificates gettext-base && \
rm -rf /var/cache/apt && rm -rf /var/lib/apt && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

EXPOSE 80 
VOLUME /var/www/html 
CMD nginx -g 'daemon off;'
